hudson.tasks.Shell.command: ARTIFACTS="org.apache.maven.plugin-tools:maven-plugin-tools-api:jar:2.5 org.apache.maven.plugin-tools:maven-plugin-tools-java:jar:2.5 org.apache.maven.plugin-tools:maven-plugin-tools-beanshell:jar:2.5 org.apache.maven.reporting:maven-reporting-impl:jar:2.1 org.apache.maven.reporting:maven-reporting-impl:jar:2.1 org.apache.maven.shared:maven-doxia-tools:jar:1.4 org.apache.maven.shared:maven-shared-jar:jar:1.1 org.apache.maven.wagon:wagon-file:jar:1.0 org.apache.maven.wagon:wagon-http-lightweight:jar:1.0 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-api:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-manager-plexus:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-hg:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-perforce:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-starteam:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-svn-commons:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-svnexe:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-cvs-commons:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-cvsexe:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-cvsjava:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-gitexe:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.scm:maven-scm-provider-git-commons:jar:1.8 org.apache.maven.doxia:doxia-decoration-model:jar:1.2 org.apache.maven.doxia:doxia-site-renderer:jar:1.2 org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-interpolation:jar:1.9 commons-validator:commons-validator:jar:1.4.0 joda-time:joda-time:jar:1.6.2" CMD="/opt/kojak/scripts/build/mead-download-and-import -v -r -t rcm-mw-tools --owner koji" $CMD $ARTIFACTS GAVS=$(/opt/kojak/scripts/build/import-maven-repo /var/lib/jenkins/maven-repositories/${EXECUTOR_NUMBER}) for gav in $GAVS; do cd $gav && /opt/kojak/scripts/build/import-maven --tag rcm-mw-tools --owner koji * ; done
